name: Skunx Workshop Mini Games
description:
We are currently in the process of developing one of our major releases! Please consider following our social media accounts linked below. Eventually, we would love to grow a community and launch a crowdfunding campaign for our first major release. In the interim, we will release our free content here on Itch and a couple of other sites. Enjoy what we have for now, as this is our first mini release - we will be adding more to it little by little. We hope to make fans and friends out of you.

Exclusive & Early content:

Minds https://www.minds.com/skunxworkshop/

Rumble https://rumble.com/user/skunxworkshop

Early content:

Twitter https://twitter.com/SkunxWorkshop

Delayed content:

Youtube https://www.youtube.com/@skunxworkshop3632

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/skunxworkshop

TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@skunx.workshop

Song for GameSelection screen is called "Caffeine Keys" by Orbital Leaf, partner of Skunx Workshop, 2nd in command. You can find his work here https://orbitalleaf.newgrounds.com/
